## RSA水题自动脚本

人生苦短，不要让水题浪费你的宝贵时间

- [x] factordb分解
- [ ] 共模
- [ ] wiener-attack
- [ ] 低加密指数广播攻击
- ...

##### Example:
```python
>>>python3 python3 simple_res_auto.py
[*] Try factor 
[*] Try connect
[*] the factor result: [, , ]
[?] Maybe success
[!] flag: b'hi allhi allhi allhi allhi allhi allhi allhi allhi allhi all'
[*] Continue? (y/n)n
[-] Thanks, bye~
```
